components.accordion: Collapsible accordion component with smooth animations and multiple item support.
components.alert: Alert component with variants, icons, and optional dismissible functionality.
components.avatar: User avatar with image fallback, initials, and status indicators.
components.avatar-group: Stacked avatar group for displaying multiple users with overflow indicator.
components.badge: Badge component with variants, sizes, and optional remove functionality.
components.breadcrumbs: Navigation breadcrumb component with customizable separators and links.
components.button: A versatile button component with variants, sizes, and icon support.
components.carousel: Image carousel with autoplay, navigation arrows, dots indicator, and captions.
components.code-snippet: Code snippet component with syntax highlighting, line numbers, and copy functionality.
components.command-palette: Command palette with keyboard shortcuts, search, and command execution.
components.data-table: Feature-rich data table with search, sorting, filtering, pagination, and loading states.
components.date-picker: Date picker with calendar interface, date formatting, and validation.
components.drawer: Slide-out drawer panel with multiple positions and overlay support.
components.dropdown: Dropdown select component with search, keyboard navigation, and multiple options.
components.empty-state: Empty state component with icon, title, description, and optional action button.
components.file-upload: File upload component with drag-and-drop, image previews, and progress tracking.
components.input: Form input field with label, error handling, password toggle, and icons.
components.kbd: Keyboard key component with icon support and multiple variants.
components.modal: Accessible modal dialog with backdrop, transition animations, and size options.
components.popover: Popover component with configurable positioning and trigger options.
components.progress-bar: Progress bar component with variants, sizes, and percentage display.
components.progress-steps: Progress steps component with clickable steps, labels, and descriptions.
components.range-slider: Range slider component with single and double handle modes, custom styling.
components.rating: Star rating component with half-star support, hover effects, and value display.
components.skeleton: Skeleton loading component with multiple variants and customizable shapes.
components.sortable-list: Drag-and-drop sortable list component with handles and animations.
components.stat-card: Statistics card component with trend indicators and customizable variants.
components.stepper: Multi-step stepper component with horizontal and vertical layouts.
components.tabs: Tab navigation component with multiple variants and dynamic content.
components.timeline: Timeline component with vertical/horizontal layouts, animations, and multiple event types.
components.toast: Toast notification system with multiple variants, positions, and auto-dismissal.
components.toggle: Toggle switch component with multiple sizes and accessibility features.
components.tooltip: Tooltip component with configurable positioning and delay settings.
